ing: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
des: "This delicious salsa dip is easy to make and blends the distinctive flavors of tarragon vinegar, green chile peppers and black olives in a zesty tomato mixture. Serve with tortilla chips."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together tomatoes, green onions, olive oil, tarragon vinegar, green chile peppers, black olives, garlic salt and salt. Cover and refrigerate 6 hours or overnight before serving.
